person.content:

Paragraph: But with the treaty , this kind of fact will be owned and subject to licensing , " said James Love , a consumer lobbyist heading the Washington-based Consumer Project on Technology .

| Person |
|--------|
| James Love |
| the consumer lobbyist heading the Washington-based Consumer Project on Technology |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| James Love |
| the consumer lobbyist |
| heading the Washington-based Consumer Project on Technology |

Note: "the consumer lobbyist heading the Washington-based Consumer Project on Technology" can be simplified to "the consumer lobbyist" since "heading the Consumer Project on Technology" implies that they are a person who holds a leadership position within the organization.
